Name: Vexius
About the game: Vexius is a grid-based puzzle platform game where your rotation and position are key. Roll or dash your way through the levels while you overcome various obstacles and hazards. Easy to learn, but can become pretty difficult with the right contraptions. Played through the game or thought of a good trap? Create your own levels with the included editor and share your bizarre creations with the public through the workshop. Key Features: Grid-based puzzling and platforming with active gameplay Obstacles and hazard to overcome, in various contraptions Create your own levels with the included editor Share your creations through the Steam Workshop
